Weird things happen round these parts

22 Jun 2018

  • 2018-06-22
  • It is not unusual to find out that something technical has broken. In that regard this blog post is just to let all of you folk stalking my github/github page know that I'm planning some real changes around here. for one I'm not sure how long these colors will stick. Orange is good, and very vibrant. However, it can occasionaly make your eyes tired.
